price: 6. Odayaashii ka mid ahaana way soo baxeen (iyagoo ku leh dadkoodii): Socda, oo ku samra oo sugnaada ilaahyadiinna. (arrin)kani waa wax laynala dooni (uu isku soo dubbariday Muxammad si uu idiin qabsado oo magac iyo sharaf ugu qaato).
arabic: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱمۡشُواْ وَٱصۡبِرُواْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٞ يُرَادُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-inṭalaqa al-mala-u min'hum ani im'shū wa-iṣ'birū ʿalā ālihatikum inna hādhā lashayon yurādu
